about_the_game:
Epic beard? Check. Angry scowl? Double check. The Leviathan axe that completes the look? Now we’re talking! Sackboy’s ready for any adventure in his new Kratos Costume, and he can even throw Leviathan with his cool Axe Throw emote.

Team up with friends who have the Atreus Costume and Freya Costume for more fun than you can throw an axe at. Get it? Like, instead of shaking a stick, you throw… an axe… and it comes back to you…

Internet connection required to access downloadable content.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit (version 1809)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6400 @ 2.7GHz, AMD FX-6300 @ 3.5GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660, AMD Radeon R7 265
  • Storage: 60 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 60 GB HDD (SSD Recommended)
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit (version 1809)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4770K @ 3.5GHz AMD Ryzen 5 1500X @ 3.5GHz
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060, AMD Radeon RX580
  • Storage: 60 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 60 GB HDD (SSD Recommended)
